::Hot Rod::

"I think we should go..." Hot Rod is cut off, as the BH's attack.
Hot Rod jumps, barly dodging the attacks.
"SptiFire, Savanna, get DOWN!"
Hot Rod rolls acroos the ground, and back to his feet, as he fires six
plasma charges at the Bounty Hunters.
"You just made the bigest mistake of you're life."
